original_text: And this is the manner of the release: every creditor shall release what he has lent to his neighbor. He shall not exact it of his neighbor, his brother, because the Lord's release has been proclaimed.
korean_text: 면제의 규례는 이러하니라 그의 이웃에게 꾸어준 모든 채주는 그것을 면제하고 그의 이웃에게나 그 형제에게 독촉하지 말지니 이는 여호와를 위하여 면제를 선포하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And this is the manner of the release:
every creditor shall release what he has lent to his neighbor.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 채권자는 자기 이웃에게 꾸어준 것을 면제해 주어야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: He shall not exact it of his neighbor, his brother,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 이웃, 곧 자기 형제에게서 그것을 받지 말지니

sentences.original_text: because the Lord's release has been proclaimed.
